Hospital.WareHouse

Class StockConsistency

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.WareHouse.StockConsistency

  • public class StockConsistency
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class to simulate the time and check if all reservations are valid and no overstock or understock happens

      • evaluateEvents

        public static boolean evaluateEvents(java.util.PriorityQueue<StockChangeEvent> events,
                     int items,
                     int order,
                     int maxStock,
                     OrderPlacer o)
        Calculates the simulated future given the current knownledge of appointments
        Parameters:
        events - The events that change the stock
        items - the current number of items in stock
        order - the current number of orders
        maxStock - the maximum stock
        o - the orderplacer for this stock
        Returns:
        false if errors happen
